description: a(n) = n + next number > n beginning with same digit as n.
example: a(1)=11 because 1 + the next number greater than 1 that begins with 1 is 10, which gives eleven. a(19)= 119 because 19 + the next number greater than 19 that begins with 1 is 100, which gives 119.
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Mar 27 2001
